# PDSR {.unnumbered}

<img src="assets/pdsr_cover.webp" alt="ProgDatSciR" style="width:100%;filter: drop-shadow(0 0 .3rem #333);"/>
<br><br>
**Programming for Data Science in R** is aimed as an introductory- to intermediate-level  
programming learning resource for R.

It is the online reference for UCSF Biostat 
[213](https://epibiostat.ucsf.edu/programming-health-data-science-r-biostat-213) & 
[214](https://epibiostat.ucsf.edu/programming-health-data-science-r-ii-biostat-214).
<br><br>
E.D. Gennatas MBBS AICSM PhD  
[Laboratory of Computational Medicine](https://www.lambdamd.org/){target="_blank"},  
[University of California, San Francisco](https://www.ucsf.edu/){target="_blank"}
